How many people are affected by Townes-Brocks Syndrome ?,"The prevalence of this condition is unknown, although one study estimated that it may affect 1 in 250,000 people. It is difficult to determine how frequently Townes-Brocks syndrome occurs because the varied signs and symptoms of this disorder overlap with those of other genetic syndromes.",GHR,Townes-Brocks Syndrome
